TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_calavi, title = calavi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/calavi} }

S.FORM: calavi aicu a calavi a qinaljan mavan a pinuljavakan nua i taitu king i tjauvali guan. aza kadjunangan nua calavi imaza i pasataimali a navalj, a i viri ciul kanalung, a i kacedasan secevung tua taipinyang, pasamaza ledepan a navalj nakitangez tua kavulungan, a i navalj kicaing tua i daibu a tjacupu a mula. situcuan a i qinaljan a caucau tjatjuruvu a paiwan zuku. aza i runpul a kinasaluan a cemas, avan za ciulukiu, tinsikiu. a i taiki izua haliluya, ciulukiu kata napinailangan a palisi, a mituhu uta. a imaza a sikataqaljan temalem tua nanemanga sikac. == nasidjaravacan ==

calavi aico a calavi a qinaljan mavan a pinoljavakan noa i taito king i tjaovali goan. aza kadjonangan noa calavi imaza i pasataimali a navalj, a i viri ciol kanalong, a i kacedasan secevong toa taipinyang, pasamaza ledepan a navalj nakitangez toa kavolongan, a i navalj kicaing toa i daibo a tjacopo a mola. sitocoan a i qinaljan a caocao tjatjorovo a paiwan zoko. aza i ronpol a kinasaloan a cemas, avan za ciolokio, tinsikio. a i taiki izoa haliloya, ciolokio kata napinailangan a palisi, a mitoho ota. a imaza a sikataqaljan temalem toa nanemanga sikac. == nasidjaravacan ==
